entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Osoyoos
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:03 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Osoyoos 02:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: 5.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 50 %
Dewpoint: -3.9°C
Wind: N 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind north 20 km/h. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 8:35 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:35 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 8:35 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023
